course.long_description:
Here you can find all materials for the PyLadies Vienna Beginners Python Course. All lectures are for complete beginners. Instructions are for Linux, Windows and macOS.
If you have any questions, feel free to contact us on pyladies.vienna@gmail.com

materials.title: VS Code keybindings cheat sheet Windows
VS Code keybindings cheat sheet Mac OS
Have you just made a git mess?
Requests and getting data via APIs
